description: Read manual and verify parts.
Dry fit outter frame of lower bed.
Place down slats.
Screw outter frame together and slats down.
Place first bed frame aside.
Dry fit outter frame of upper bed.
Place down slats.
Screw outter frame together and slats down.
Verify bed frames are identical.
Dry fit back long safety railing for upper bed frame.
Dry fit front long safety railing for upper bed frame.
Dry fit short safety railing at head AND foot of upper bed frame.
Screw safety railings in to upper bed frame.
Verify railings are secure.
Place upper bed frame to side.
Dry fit long sides and rungs of ladder together.
Screw ladder together to secure it.
Screw hooks to back of ladder.
Place ladder aside.
Place upper bunk on top of lower.
Secure bunks together with brackets.
Attach ladder and enjoy!
